medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over black chalk on laid paper
title: The Imitative and Descriptive Arts
description: mounted on white paper with pink border; two group of figures confronting one another; group at left lead by a figure carrying a bundle of paintbrushes; figure at far left holds a painter\'s palette; monkey-like animal in front of figure with paintbrushes; group at right lead by a figure handing a cello; goose peering around drapery of same figure
